info.title: Shipping API
info.description: Shipping for manage Shipment,Create , Edit ,Tracking Status  ...

get.summary: Get all cities by country Id
Get shipments for the current user (paginated).
Get a single shipment by ID (for user).

put.summary: Change the status of an existing shipment.

parameters.name: newStatus
parameters.description:
New status to apply to the shipment.
Available values: Created = 0, Deleted = 1, Approved = 2, ReadyForShip = 3, Shipped = 4, Delivered = 5, Returned = 6.

get.summary: Get a shipping package by Id

patch.summary: Change status of a shipping package (e.g., Active/Inactive)

get.summary: Get a shipping type by Id

patch.summary: Change status of a shipping type

delete.summary: Delete subscription package (soft delete by changing status)

get.summary: Retrieves the profile information of the currently logged-in user.

put.summary: Updates the profile of the currently logged-in user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user ID (ignored, it is overridden by the logged-in user's ID).

get.summary: Retrieves the subscription details (with packages) for the currently logged-in user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user ID (ignored, it is overridden by the logged-in user's ID).

get.summary: Get user subscription by User Id
Get user subscription by Package Id
